1045:1: samprati dāna-śīla-kṣānti-pāramitābhyo vīryapāramitāyā atirekadeśanā-dvāreṇa caturthacittotpādamadhikṛtya ākhyāyate-
1045:7: pūrvoktaguṇasañcayasamutsuke tu prāptāprāptayorvṛddhiprāptisaṃbhavād yasya kasyacid guṇasya hetustu vīryameva asti |
1045:9: tad vīryaṃ svaguṇapariśuddhidvārā yasyāṃ bhūmāvadhijvalati sā tu caturthī bodhisatvabhūmiḥ arciṣmatīti syāt |
1045:14: ityuktam | evam asyāṃ bhūmau bodhisattve saptatriṃśad bodhipākṣikadharmabhāvanena pūrvākhyātatāmraprabhāyā viśiṣṭo'vabhāsa upapadyate |
1045:23: bodhisattvo'syāmarciṣmatyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito'dhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati,
1045:28: evamevādhyātmaṃ vedanāsu bahirdhā vedanāsu adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā vedanāsu |
1045:29: evamadhyātmaṃ citte bahirdhā citte'dhyātmaṃ bahirdhā citte |
1045:30: adhyātmaṃ dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī (viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān )
1045:31: bahirdhā dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī ... evamadhyātmaṃ bahirdhā dharmeṣu... |
1045:33: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni yathā- “so'nutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāya cchandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryamārabhate cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samyak-praṇidadhāti |
1045:36: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye'saṃpramoṣāya vaipulyāya bhūyobhāvāya (bhāvanāya)
1045:39: catvāro ṛddhipādāḥ “ chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgataṃ ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniścitaṃ virāganiścitaṃ nirodhaniścitaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ [tadvat] vīrya [samādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgataṃ ṛddhipādaṃ ] bhāvayati citta [samādhi-prahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgataṃ ṛddhipādaṃ] bhāvayati mīmāṃsā [samādhiprahāṇasaṃskāra-samanvāgataṃ ṛddhipādaṃ ] bhāvayatītyādi pūrvavat | “
1045:45: [ityādi] dharmapravicaya [bodhyaṅgaṃ ] vīrya [saṃbodhyaṅgaṃ] prīti [saṃbodhyaṅgaṃ ] prastrabdhi-[saṃbodhyaṅgaṃ] samādhi [saṃbodhyaṅgaṃ] upekṣā [saṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati ityādi pūrvavat ] | “
1045:46: āryāṣṭāṅgamārgastu yathā-“ samyakdṛṣṭiṃ bhāvayati [virāganiścitaṃ nirodha- niścitaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ] samyaksaṅkalpaṃ [api pūrvavat] samyagvācaṃ........ samyakkarmāntaṃ......samyagājīvaṃ......samyagvyāyāmaṃ.....samyaksmṛtiṃ...samyaksamādhiṃ |
1045:51: bodhisattvasya asyāmarciṣmatyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya yānīmāni satkāyadṛṣṭi-pūrvaṅgamāni ātmasattvajīvapoṣa (puruṣa)
1045:52: pudalaskandhadhātvāyatanābhiniveśa-samucchritāni unmarjjitāni nimajjitāni vicintitāni vitarkitāni kelāyitāni mamāyitāni dhanāyitāni niketasthānāni,
1045:53: tāni sarvāṇi vigatāni bhavanti sma | “ ityuktam |
